entry.title: About — Sara Perez
entry.content:
Contact​

  • Email: golbeksara@gmail.com
  • LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/in/saragolbek

Top Skills​

  • Responsive Web Design
  • React
  • Express.js

Certifications​

  • Linux Essentials Certification
  • ITIL 4 Foundation Certificate in IT Service Management

Summary​

Thanks for stopping by my profile! I’m a Full-Stack Software Developer with a passion for creating robust web applications and dynamic software solutions. My toolbox includes HTML/CSS, JavaScript, React, and Node.js. I thrive in fast-paced environments and enjoy every phase of the Software Development Life Cycle. I’m a collaborative team player who uses Agile practices to deliver value. Let’s connect and build something amazing together!

Experience​

Full Stack Engineer​

  • July 2023 — Present (San Francisco Bay Area)
  • Open to opportunities; working as a Full Stack Engineer building web applications using React and Node.js.

Fremont Unified School District — Elementary School Teacher​

  • August 2024 — Present (Fremont, California)
  • Integrated educational software to foster collaborative projects, developed and implemented adaptive lessons, and collaborated with colleagues and parents to improve student outcomes.
  • Built custom dashboards and used tracking and analytics tools to monitor student progress and behavior trends.

San José Unified School District — Elementary School Teacher​

  • January 2021 — June 2024 (San Jose, California)
  • Designed and implemented digital lessons using Canvas, Istation, and IXL to enhance engagement.
  • Mentored colleagues in remote and hybrid learning strategies and led initiatives using Excel and Google Sheets for trend analysis to improve learning outcomes.

Education​

  • Western Governors University — B.S., Computer Science (December 2024)
  • Altcademy — Full-Stack Web Development (September 2023)
  • Cal Poly Humboldt — B.A., Liberal Studies (December 2015)

Connect​

If you'd like to collaborate or learn more about my work, reach out via email or LinkedIn — I’m always open to conversation and opportunities.
